items.sentence: Tom easily convinced Mary that he was innocent.
Tom easily learned the basic rules of the game.
Tom eats brown rice more often than white rice.
I\'m not interested in going to Tom\'s concert.
The meeting needs to begin as soon as possible.
All of three of Tom\'s daughters are beautiful.
I\'m very thankful for all you\'ve done for me.
Everyone agreed that it was the right decision.
Tom used to play piano at a club I often go to.
Tom used to play tennis every Monday afternoon.
Tom used to play the banjo when he was younger.
I can\'t thank you enough for all you\'ve done.
Tom sells most of the vegetables that he grows.
Tom sends money home to his family every month.
Tom wondered if it had really been an accident.
Tom puts salt on just about everything he eats.
Tom saw Mary and John flirting with each other.
I can\'t believe we\'ve never done this before.
Why don\'t you tell me something I don\'t know?
I suggest that you begin doing that right away.
